description: Numbers n such that product of n with sum of next n consecutive integers is palindromic.
comments: Also, number n such that n^2*(3*n+1)/2 is palindromic.No additional terms below 10^10. - _Jens Vo√ü_, Feb 20 2009
maple: A036659 := proc(n) n^2*(3*n+1)/2 ; end: isA002113 := proc(n) local b10,i ; b10 := convert(n,base,10) ; for i from 1 to nops(b10)/2 do if op(i,b10) <> op(-i,b10) then RETURN(false) ; fi ; od ; RETURN(true) ; end: for n from 1 to 1000000 do c := A036659(n) : if isA002113(c) then print(n) ; fi ; od : # _R. J. Mathar_, Jun 26 2007
